name: HI JUMP - Rescue Him
description:
Meet our little climber "Hi". Drag the ball and climb as many floor as you can to reach the sky. Try not to fall down! Jump forever and become a sky rusher.

This will be your new addictive trending game. Very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores. How far can you go?

Catch up with your friends and show them how high you can jump and climb without a drop. Don't forget to share your score on instagram.

Go ahead and download this addictive game for free!
